uae.name: United Arab Emirates
uae.climate: Desert climate: very hot summers, mild winters
uae.speciality: Futuristic cities, luxury shopping, desert adventures
uae.culture: Blend of Emirati heritage and modern cosmopolitan lifestyle.

essentialTips.title: Dress Code
essentialTips.note: Dress modestly in public places and religious sites.

essentialTips.title: Payments
essentialTips.note: Cards widely accepted; some souks prefer cash.

faqs.a: Allowed in licensed venues; public intoxication is illegal.
